Detailed Description

Provides a base class definition for streaming back messages to the parent process.

virtual void Progress::SetStepProperties ( int  level,
int  mx,
int  inc 
) [pure virtual]

Sets the upper limit of the range of the progress display.

Parameters:
level - level of verbosity desired.
mx The maximum number of steps in the task.
inc The number of steps performed before the progress display is updated.

Implemented in DotProgress.

Steps the progress ahead by one count.
